alert.note: Alert for Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued February 28 at 4:03AM AKST until February 28 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 9 inches with heaviest amounts up to 12 inches. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills south of Shaktoolik. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow reducing visibility to near zero at times. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 40 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heaviest snowfall around Norton Bay.
info.instruction: A Blizzard Warning means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. Falling and blowing snow with strong winds and poor visibilities are likely. This will lead to whiteout conditions, making travel extremely difficult.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Norton Sound and Nulato Hills
